mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MEM_NUM DESC) RNUM, MEM_NUM, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZIPCODE, MEM_ADDRESS1, MEM_ADDRESS2, TO_CHAR(MEM_JOINDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') MEM_JOINDATE, MEM_DEL_GB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID != 'admin'
SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZIPCODE, MEM_ADDRESS1, MEM_ADDRESS2, TO_CHAR(MEM_JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MEM_JOINDATE, MEM_DEL_GB FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
